sentences.english: Ginger and turmeric are about as close as you can get to good-tasting medicine.
sentences.chinese: 姜和姜黄大概是味道最好的药物。

sentences.english: Turmeric and sweet basil are commonly used Ayurvedic herbs.
sentences.chinese: 姜黄和罗勒都是常用的阿育吠陀草药。

sentences.english: Making a tea of a half-teaspoonful of turmeric and some honey to sweeten works well, too.
sentences.chinese: 放半匙姜黄和一些蜂蜜的甜茶也有很好的效果。
印度女人们打赌用姜黄就能解决。

sentences.english: To investigate inhibitory effect of curcumin and its mechanism on insulin resistance.
sentences.chinese: 为探讨姜黄素对胰岛素抵抗的治疗作用及其机制。

sentences.english: Turmeric is mildly aromatic and has scents of orange or ginger.
sentences.chinese: 姜黄粉气味芬芳，发出一种橙子和生姜的气味。

sentences.english: Effect of curcumin on proliferation and apoptosis of hepatic stellate cell line.
sentences.chinese: 姜黄素对肝星状细胞增殖与凋亡的影响。

sentences.english: I enjoy beetroot and kale smoothies with a dash of turmeric and ground pepper.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢甜菜根和甘蓝奶昔，外加少许姜黄和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: These results suggest that curcumin may be an effective countermeasure.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果表明，姜黄素可能是一个有效的对策。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of turmeric oil on ultrastructure of keratinocyte.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨姜黄油对角质形成细胞超微结构的影响。

sentences.english: A new technique for extraction of curcumin in curcuma aromatica has been developed, which is based on cellulose enzymolysis.
sentences.chinese: 提出了纤维素酶预处理法提取郁金中姜黄素的新工艺。

sentences.english: Conclusion Curcumin can accelerate human bladder cancer T24 cells apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: 结论姜黄素促进人膀胱癌T24细胞凋亡。

sentences.english: Objective To systematically evaluate the quality of Curcuma longa L. in Chinese market.
sentences.chinese: 目的综合评价国产市售姜黄药材质量。

sentences.english: Our Turmeric is never fumigated or irradiated.
sentences.chinese: 我们的姜黄是从来没有的熏蒸或照射。

sentences.english: Objective To study on preparation and encapsulation of Curcumin liposomes.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究姜黄素脂质体制备的最佳方法。

definition: red root gromwell (Lithospermum erythrorhizon)/flowering plant whose roots provide purple dye/arnebia (plant genus in family Boraginaceae)
nutmeg (Myristica fragrans Houtt)/mace/Myristicaceae (family of plants producing aromatic or hallucinogenic oils)
Chinese foxglove (Rehmannia glutinosa), its rhizome used in TCM
